item.title: Visualizing Interlocking Directorates, 1913
item.description: From the St.Louis Fed. Fraser site.   "Exhibit 243: Diagram Showing Affiliations of J.P. Morgan & Co., National City Bank, First National Bank, Guaranty Trust Co. and Bankers Trust Co. of New York City with Large Corporations of the United States" from the FED economic history blog. From the Money Trust Investigation : Investigation of Financial and Monetary Conditions in the United States Under House Resolutions Nos.

item.title: The data on white anxiety over Hispanic immigration
item.description: The data on white anxiety over Hispanic immigration (Via my pal, UMass Prof. Arin Dube) A fantastic piece on racial anxiety and views on race. A nice little combination of academic research and polling insights.Â
